# `git`

## `git tag`

First `git commit` your changes before adding a new `tag` .

```{bash pressure, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
git commit -m 'Your message' folder/your_updated_file.txt
git push
git tag v1.2.4
git push --tags
```
